Unprecedented COVID-19 lockdown as Muslims mark somber Ramadan tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735531 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735531/unprecedented-covid-19-lockdown-as-muslims-mark-somber-ramadan/story/ Mosques stood empty and fast-breaking feasts were cancelled as Muslims around the world began marking Ramadan under coronavirus lockdown on Friday, while a pushback in some countries sparked fears of a surge in infections. Some Caloocan residents have no electricity amid COVID-19 quarantine tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735526 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735526/some-caloocan-residents-have-no-electricity-amid-covid-19-quarantin/story/ "Hindi po natin masasabi na talagang naco-comply natin ang enhanced quarantine natin dahil 'yung iba dahil sa init, talagang lumalabas. Kabilang na rito ang pagbabawal na gawin itong tambayan ng mga tao. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 23:59:33 +0800

US FDA warns against malaria drug's COVID-19 use outside hospitals tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735515 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735515/us-fda-warns-against-malaria-drug-s-covid-19-use-outside-hospitals/story/ The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Friday cautioned against the use of malaria drugs, hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine, in COVID-19 patients outside of hospitals and clinical trials, citing risks of serious heart rhythm problems. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 23:24:33 +0800
Ang mga frontliner sa kabilang bahagi ng laban sa COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735514 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/735514/ang-mga-frontliner-sa-kabilang-bahagi-ng-laban-sa-covid-19/story/ May mga frontliner na itinataya ang sariling kaligtasan upang isalba ang buhay ng mga taong dinapuan ng COVID-19. Ngunit sa sandaling magapi ng virus ang katawan ng pasyente, may iba pang frontliner na handa rin suungin ang panganib para tapusin ang laban-- ang mga nasa crematorium. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 23:11:41 +0800
Trump's disinfectant idea idiotic, dangerous, unscientific, doctors say tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735513 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/735513/trump-s-disinfectant-idea-idiotic-dangerous-unscientific-doctors-say/story/ LONDON - Doctors and health experts urged people not to drink or inject disinfectant on Friday after U.S. President Donald Trump suggested scientists should investigate inserting the cleaning agent into the body as a way to cure COVID-19. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 23:05:50 +0800
Salceda warns of people moving from ECQ to GCQ areas tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735505 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735505/salceda-warns-of-people-moving-from-ecq-to-gcq-areas/story/ Rep. Joey Salceda said there are three issues that we need to manage: One, people being overconfident, thinking GCQ means less risk for them. Two, confusion in checkpoints between ECQ and GCQ provinces. Three, people stealthily moving to GCQ areas so they can have it easier. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 23:05:19 +0800
Año: Local execs may no longer declare ECQ sans nod of nat'l gov't tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735511 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735511/ano-local-execs-may-no-longer-declare-ecq-sans-nod-of-nat-l-gov-t/story/ Local officials may no longer declare an enhanced community quarantine (ECQ) in their areas without the approval of the national government, Interior Secretary Eduardo Año said Friday."Ngayon po, hindi na po pwede na mag-unilateral declaration ang isang local chief executive na ilalagay niya ang isang probinsya sa ECQ. Ito ay kailangang aprubado ng IATF (Inter-Agency Task Force)," Año said at a Malacañang press briefing. Fri, 24 Apr 2020 22:38:21 +0800
